title: MOXILYN Mens Cycling Jersey MTB Clothes Cycling Kit Bike Shirts and Cycling Bibs Short with 20D Gel Pad Biking Clothing Set
features: ✪BREATHABLE, QUICK DRY, LIGHTWEIGHT - 100% Polyester. The fabric is suitable for all weather condition, regardless of hot outdoor or wet rainy weather condition. The Dry-Fit perspiration technology allow rapid discharge of water allowing the body to remain dry and comfortable

✪UV PROTECTION - This specially treated fabric is excellent and effective in blocking UVA and UVB ray during outdoor sports activities to prevent over-exposure to harmful sun-rays which are harmful to the skin. It also helps to prevent sun-burn and thereby protects the skin

✪REFLECTIVE STRIP & HIDDEN ZIPPER - Reflective stripes on the front and back that are highly visible at night to protect your safety, 3 Pockets to ensure you have ample space for storing essential gears. The elastic back hem is longer for extra coverage, keeping rear in place to better fit. Bike top quality hidden zipper slides easily making the shirt easy to put on and off. And will not affect the design pattern of the cycling shirt.

✪SATISFACTION GUARANTEED -The cycling outfit has been carefully designed to ensure its uniqueness and funny. You can keep a happy mood anytime and anytime while riding.We can guarantee Great quality and good design. If the size unsuitable issue or zipper, Please contact us freely we will solve it for you at once.We provide customer satisfaction service
✪NOTE: Please measure by yourself to find your size. If you like the loose version, please order a larger size. If you have any questions, you can always Contact customer service.
description: Why choose MOXILYN cycling outfits？ 1.Combination of functional materials and an innovative mesh vent design for riders of all levels. 2.Biking shorts is made of 80% polyester and 20% spandex lycra with pads ventilation, UPF 50+.9-inch inseam,Stretchable and comfortable fit. 3.Reflective stripe design on the shorts.
